name: Depths Of Hell (KarimSaid)
description:
This game was uploaded for the game jam: MiniJam 109  which takes place over 3 days, the theme of the game jam was Depth/ Depth(s) whilst the limitation of the game was Health is a Tool. 

The objective of the game is to find all the 3 keys and the portal to get out of there! Its that simple... but is it?

The game will resume development depending on the feedback given back on the game jam and by you guys! so please let me know what you think and what you would like added in the future <3!

This page will be updated tomorrow with further details tomorrow. Its 6 AM here where I live and I need to catch some sleep. Have fun with the game guys <3.
